alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:36PM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Louisiana. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM Tuesday to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry
